```js static
// JS import
import {ProgressSteps, ProgressStepsItem} from 'progressive-web-sdk/dist/components/progress-steps'

// SCSS import
@import 'node_modules/progressive-web-sdk/dist/components/progress-steps/base';
```


## Example Usage

```jsx
<ProgressSteps>
    <ProgressStepsItem title="Shipping" href="#" />
    <ProgressStepsItem title="Payment" />
    <ProgressStepsItem title="Review" current />
    <ProgressStepsItem title="Complete" />
</ProgressSteps>
```

## Example With Icons

```jsx
<ProgressSteps>
    <ProgressStepsItem title="Shipping" href="#" icon="shipping" />
    <ProgressStepsItem title="Payment" icon="payment" />
    <ProgressStepsItem title="Review" icon="review" current />
    <ProgressStepsItem title="Complete" icon="check" />
</ProgressSteps>
```
